name: OVERLAP (Doronnoga, RTpeach)
description:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

OVERLAP

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

OVERLAP is a co-op game about cooperation and nimbleness. 

Climb up to victory, survive faster and faster races on an ever-expanding never-ending playing field. 

on each win, play in your friend's place in a testing role switch.

This game was made at the "Game Jam" class at Bezalel Academy of art and design.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Playing keys-

Left player (shooter):

W- Go up.

A- Shoot from the left side of the screen.

S- Go down.

D- Shoot from the right side of the screen.

Righ player (runner):

Up key- go up

Down key- go down

Left key- go left

Right key-  go right

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
